original_title: Colonial Life for Children: Plimoth Plantation
overview: In this educational DVD. Tracy and Greg, wondering what life for the Pilgrims was really like, blast back in time to Plimoth Plantation. Follow along as they visit with the Pilgrims and learn about daily life. A Wampanoag woman also teaches the kids about the food, shelter and customs of the region's Native American people.
title: Colonial Life for Children: Plimoth Plantation
